Right here , doin Reno’s 7 days a week a lot of late nights , couldn’t be happier. Still crushing on Ingraham though
Feminism happened. Almost all feminist don't want equality. They want superiority

Everything Laura said was true. But the core problem is that violent men feel empowered to attack women. That's because they know they won't be held legally accountable. Crime is soaring in every US city. Leftist politicians have changed the laws. It's increasingly futile for the police departments that haven't been de-funded to arrest criminals who commit crimes like these. When they are arrested, they're immediately released, on low or no bail. Plus if the assailant is black and the victim isn't, anyone who wants to intervene, does so knowing they'll be labeled a 'racist', and then doxxed, fired or even arrested. Being a Good Samaritan no longer means being brave in the moment. It means risking your livelihood. This is what happens in the intersection of "woke" culture + pro-criminal laws.
John 6:47 "verily, verily I say unto you, he that believes in me has everlasting life."-Jesus.
Take it easy on the Botox hotdog head.

Is this society worth protecting, sacrificing and providing for?

IMO, not really 

Sure, _if_ you have kids you _have_ to do all those things because now you’re locked into the system. Even if it’s not an ideal system 

But there’s a lot of guys out there who were raised in subpar conditions (poor-single parent household), and grew up inhibited because of that. Now they’re adults, or soon will be. 
And more of them are going to start feeling resentment towards society, especially if it doesn’t have their best interests in mind.
Enjoy the Decline, live your life
